column4: Hi! Could somebody help me play asf stream in firefox? What codecs do I need?
to play mp3 on xmms you need to get mpg123
no
apt-cache show xmms-mad
technically you need 'libmad0'  :/
yes
I didn't say it wouldn't work... its just not the 'correct' way  :/
libmad0 is a far better decoder than mpg123  :/
you're welcome
umm... w32codecs doesn't support that?
apparently not. i have that and no cigar
heh... I've never even see an asf stream... so can't speak from experience  :(
try the 'all' pack from mplayerhq.hu  though
i want to play the streams on http://www.webtelek.com/tv.php?
don't get mplayer
you already have totem-xine installed?
no... but I'm not using the 'all' pack at mplayerhq.hu ...
just get that, extract contents, and throw them into /usr/lib/win32 and try to view them again
should i get the 'all' pack but not mplayer??
correct...
w32codecs is the 'essential' pack
will try that, thanks
